SupportedGames: These are the games I know: %(answer)s
WelcomeIntent: Board games answers questions about the rules of your favorite table top games. Ask a question like, how many dice do I start with in Yahtzee? What would you like to know?
HelpIntent: Ask Board Games questions about the rules of table top games. Ask a question like how many route cards do I start with in Ticket to Ride or when does Monopoly end? You can hear which games are supported by asking what games do you know?
